issues.description: The reference solution defines the farm’s `animals` attribute as a `Set<Animal>`, but the problem specification and UML clearly require a `List<Animal>` backed by an `ArrayList`. This mismatch will cause students’ implementations (and tests) expecting a `List` to fail against the provided solution.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the solution’s farm attribute to `private List<Animal> animals;`, import `java.util.ArrayList`, and in the no‐arg constructor initialize it with `animals = new ArrayList<>();` to match the problem statement.
